scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.install:all: bun run install:frontend && bun run install:backend
scripts.lint: bun run lint:frontend && bun run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff check .
scripts.lint:backend:fix: cd backend && uv run ruff check --fix .
scripts.fmt:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff format .
scripts.fmt:check:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff format --check .
scripts.index:build: cd backend && uv run python scripts/build_index.py
scripts.check: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun run test:backend
